name: Best Game Made in Paint ever
name_original: Best Game Made in Paint ever
description:
Simulator game about surviving in the spoiled capitalistic society. To make it out alive, you need to collect as much as you can Campbell's soup cans.

Small guide:

Find soup can, return it to your home. Then, try to survive. The difficulty will increase the more you play.  Show your highscores in comments!

Controls:
  • WASD to move.
  • LMB to shoot.
  • Q and E to interact with merchant dog.

P.S. If you have some problems with controls, consider downloading Windows version 

Game was made for Paint Jam 2021

Accepted Paint Jam Challenges:
  • All sound effects are made with our mouths.
  • Only default Paint color palette.
  • 3D game only with flat images.
  • Only comic sans as font.
  • All arts were made without a drawing tablet.
  • Only pencil tool.
  • No transparencies.
  • Logo without any fonts.
Authors:
  • SmelJey - code, art, level design.
  • Unkorunk - code, art, audio.
  • Syrmentix - code art, level design.
